body.name: Farberware EcoAdvantage Ceramic Nonstick Frying Pan/Skillet, 10 Inch, Aqua
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 23 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: GET THE ECO ADVANTAGE: You don't have to sacrifice performance for sustainability. Farberware Eco Advantage cookware is made from energy efficient, 100% recycled aluminum that still heats up quickly and evenly for reliable results, recipe after recipe.

COOK EASY, COOK HEALTHY: Versatile frying pan features a longer lasting, scratch-resistant ceramic nonstick that requires less oil for healthier cooking and effortless food release. Easier cooking and easier cleaning so you can spend more quality time during mealtime.
CRAFTED FOR CONVENIENCE: Dishwasher safe nonstick skillet is easy to clean and delivers reliable performance for family meal making

HEALTHY AND NON-TOXIC: Nonstick frypan is made without PFAS, PFOA, PTFE, lead, or cadmium for cookware that's safe to cook on and doesn't sacrifice an ounce of quality along the way (Manufacturing process does not involve adding to the product any of these substances which may otherwise be present in the environment)

RECIPE READY: Sustainable cookware that stands up to busy family kitchens includes a double-riveted, stay-cool handle for comfort and control. Handle features a hanging loop ring for show-off storage.
body.description: Made from 100 percent recycled aluminum, Farberware Eco Advantage™ Nonstick Cookware is designed with care and quality for healthy family cooking and a healthier planet for generations to come. This versatile frying pan features a non-toxic, longer-lasting, scratch-resistant ceramic nonstick for reliable performance in busy family kitchens, and a practical design includes conveniences like dishwasher safe cleanup. The comfortable, stay-cool handle is double-riveted for a secure and confident grip, and the frying pan is oven safe to 350°F for out-of-the-box, recipe-ready performance. Bring cookware to the family kitchen that's safe and easy to cook on and doesn't sacrifice an ounce of quality along the way. When it's time to cook with love (and help the planet) cook with Farberware Eco Advantage™.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Use it almost every day! The perfect pot.
reviews.reviewText: I love this nonstick pot so much and the aqua color is so pretty. It's perfect for all the basics. I usually use it to cook pasta, rice, or oatmeal. The size is great. It's a little taller than the average pot, but this is good because it prevents overflow. As an oatmeal lover, I've tried to cook oats in different nonstick pots, and this one is the absolute best. It cooks food perfectly and evenly, while with other ones I've tried, I end up with excess milk, dry oats, etc. Even better, despite being used almost every day for months, there's not a single scratch or mark on it. It survives being in the dishwasher regularly. I also like that the sides of the lid go down into the pot itself to make sure it doesn't fall off. Finally, the handle is great. Good length, and doesn't get hot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful, durable, easy to clean and even heating. My new favorite!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really nice affordable straining sauce pan
reviews.reviewText: Great quality, well made, durable, easy to use and very attractive. Bottom scrapes easily on burner grate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a useful plan on a ceramic cooktop stove
reviews.reviewText: Ceramic cooktops demand care and are best used with lighter pots and pans that still cook without burning.This is an ideal breakfast pan. It cooks sausages and baco evenly and can be wiped out with a paper towel for butter of oil for cooking eggs or pancakes . Very little fat is needed. It washes out and also wipes out very easily and heats up reasonably quickly. Nothing scratches it, it’s not particularly thick construction so mine was slightly bent in transport, not enough to damage the ceramic coating or the overall ability to conduct heat. Only the edge was bent out of round. I used a rubber mallet to reshape it. It’s also lightweight which makes it easier to handle but I was surprised that the food on it can be well browned if desired but it didn’t even burn the butter so can be used on medium high heat if needed. I think it would make a good omelet pan because it’s easy to fold eggs and add them to a serving plate after they are cooked .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well enough
reviews.reviewText: It smells a little funny the first few time I used it, but not bad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Happy with this
reviews.reviewText: Exactly as described and what I needed. For me it's a little difficult to use the cover as a strainer but I'm guessing most people wouldn't have an issue. Have used several times and it's holding up great and easy to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The griddle is great, it’s nonstick… but the handle is heavier than the pan and tips it over until you have something in it.

reviews.reviewText: Excellent weight, inner-coating & construction.Appears a winner.
